## registerDrawing

[src/components/D3Graph.js:103-105][152]

注册Drawing绘制类

### Parameters

-   `name` **[String][140]** name值必须和绘图类的类名保持一致
-   `drawing` **[Function][153]** 绘图类

## fromDrawing

[src/components/D3Graph.js:172-175][154]

反序列化drawing

### Parameters

-   `drawingOps` **[DrawingOptionType][155]** 

## fromActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:203-220][156]

反序列化actions

### Parameters

-   `actions` **[Array][141]&lt;[ActionOptionType][157]>** 

### Examples

```javascript
const actions=fromActions([{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"LineDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"line1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
},{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"DotDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"dot1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
}])
```

## Action

[src/components/D3Graph.js:233-263][158]

action基类

### Parameters

-   `type`  
-   `params`  
-   `ops`  

### type

[src/components/D3Graph.js:239-239][159]

action的类型,是一个枚举值

Type: [ActionTypeEnums][160]

### params

[src/components/D3Graph.js:244-244][161]

action的参数

Type: [Array][141]

### nextInterval

[src/components/D3Graph.js:249-249][162]

playing模式执行下一步时的时间间隔,默认没有

Type: [Number][163]?

### canBreak

[src/components/D3Graph.js:254-254][164]

是否允许中断操作

Type: [boolean][165]

## InputAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:268-281][166]

## DrawAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:296-300][167]

**Extends Action**

绘图action

### Parameters

-   `drawingOps`  
-   `ops`  

### Examples

```javascript
<D3Graph actions={[
	new DrawAction(new LineDrawing({id:"line1",attrs:{x1:0,y1:0,x2:100,y2:100}})),
	new DrawAction(new DotAction({id:"dot1",attrs:{cx:100,cy:100}}))
]}/>
```

[src/components/D3Graph.js:312-316][168]

**Extends Action**

选择action

### Parameters

-   `shapeId`  
-   `ops`  

### Examples

```javascript
<D3Graph actions={[new SelectAction('SHAPE_ID')]}/>
```

## Drawing

[src/components/D3Graph.js:409-602][174]

绘画接口,所有的绘画类都需要继承这个类并实现相关方法

### Parameters

-   `option` **[Object][138]** 

### id

[src/components/D3Graph.js:425-425][175]

图形的id,如果没有提供会生成一个guid

Type: [String][140]

### attrs

[src/components/D3Graph.js:430-430][176]

图形的attrs

Type: [Object][138]

### text

[src/components/D3Graph.js:435-435][177]

对应svg元素的text

Type: ([String][140] \| [Function][153])

### type

[src/components/D3Graph.js:446-446][178]

绘图的类型

Type: [String][140]

### ready

[src/components/D3Graph.js:458-458][179]

是否已经初始化

Type: [Boolean][165]

### defaultAttrs

[src/components/D3Graph.js:472-474][180]

默认的attribute

Type: [Object][138]

### selectedAttrs

[src/components/D3Graph.js:481-483][181]

选中时的attribute

Type: [Object][138]

### render

[src/components/D3Graph.js:488-494][182]

绘制,更新selection相关

### getLinkPoint

[src/components/D3Graph.js:499-501][183]

获取link的点的位置信息

### initialize

[src/components/D3Graph.js:506-509][184]

初始化drawing,创建selection,监听事件需要在里面实现

#### Parameters

-   `graph`  

### updateAttrs

[src/components/D3Graph.js:514-522][185]

批量更新attrs

#### Parameters

-   `selection`  
-   `attrs`  

### select

[src/components/D3Graph.js:527-533][186]

选中当前图形

### remove

[src/components/D3Graph.js:538-543][187]

删除图形

### toData

[src/components/D3Graph.js:584-593][188]

将图形数据序列化

Returns **{type: [String][140], id: [String][140], attrs: [Object][138], text: ([String][140] \| [Function][153])}**

[src/components/D3Graph.js:599-601][189]

### getArrowLinkPath

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1099-1129][204]

#### Parameters

-   `startPoint`  开始点
-   `endPoint`  结束点
-   `distance`  箭头的长度,长度越短箭头越小

Returns **[Array][141]&lt;[string][140]>**

## D3Graph

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2089-2591][230]

**Extends Component**

运筹学图形D3

### Parameters

-   `props`  

### getDrawingData

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2445-2455][231]

获取图形数据

Returns **[Array][141]&lt;any>** 

**Meta**

-   **deprecated**: 请使用`getDrawingActions`代替


### getDrawingActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2461-2470][232]

获取所有绘图的action

Returns **[Array][141]&lt;any>** 

### clear

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2475-2480][233]

清除画布,这个方法除了会把画布上的内容清除以外还会重置内部的action状态

### propTypes

[src/components/D3Graph.js:2102-2139][234]

#### Properties

-   `attrs` **[object][138]** svg的属性
-   `actions` **[Array][141]** 所有的操作
-   `selectMode` **(single | multiple)** [single] - 选择模式,是多选还是单选
-   `original` **[object][138]** 坐标原点(屏幕坐标),默认值{x:0,y:0}
-   `coordinateType` **([screen][235] \| [math][236])** [screen] - 坐标系,默认值是屏幕坐标系
-   `mode` **(none | playing)** 模式,默认是:none,如果是playing,则是样式模式,会一步一步的演示绘图过程
-   `renderToolbar` **[Function][153]** 绘图的工具栏
-   `scale` **[Number][163]?** [1] - 缩放比例,默认是1(1个单位对应一个像素)
-   `interval` **[Number][163]?** [1] - action的执行时间间隔
-   `onAction` **[Function][153]?** [null] - action的回调函数,函数包含一个参数 action
